arm_group.description: The test group received oral hygiene instructions, supragingival and subgingival scaling and root planning using curettes and an ultrasonic appliance.

brief_summary.textblock:
Objective: The aim of this study was to examine the effects of non-surgical periodontal
      treatment on the hemogram, glycemic and lipid profiles in cardiopathic patients with an
      indication for surgical revascularization.

      Materials and Methods: Twenty-two patients with chronic periodontitis, over 35 years of age
      (mean age 59.45 years) randomly assigned into 2 groups were evaluated. Test group (n=11),
      received periodontal treatment before the surgical procedure, and control group (n=11), did
      not received periodontal treatment prior to surgery.

clinical_study.brief_title: Non-surgical Periodontal Treatment on Hemogram, Lipid and Glycemic Profiles in Patients With Coronariopathies
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Non-surgical Periodontal Treatment on Hemogram, Lipid and Glycemic Profiles of Patients With an Indication for Surgical Coronary Revascularization

primary_outcome.description: Reduction of 11.4% in probing depth in sites with Periodontal Probing Depth>3mm
primary_outcome.measure: Reduction in probing depth in sites with PPD>3mm
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after the initial exam

primary_outcome.description: Reduction of 6.3% in probing depth in sites with Periodontal Probing Depth>5mm
primary_outcome.measure: Reduction in probing depth in sites with PPD>5mm
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after the initial exam

primary_outcome.description: Reduction of 4.6% in probing depth in sites with Clinical Attachment Level >3mm.
primary_outcome.measure: Reduction in probing depth in sites with CAL>3mm
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after the initial exam

primary_outcome.description: Reduction of 3.6% in probing depth in sites with Clinical Attachment Level >5mm.
primary_outcome.measure: Reduction in probing depth in sites with CAL >5mm
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after the initial exam

primary_outcome.description: Non-significant reduction of leukocyte count in the test group. Mean difference of 74.6 m/mcL.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after the initial exam

primary_outcome.description: Glucose showed a non-significant increase in the test group. Mean difference of 24.2 mg/dL.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after the initial exam

primary_outcome.description: Hemocyte presented a non-significant reduction in the test group. Mean difference 0.39 m/mcL
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after initial exam

primary_outcome.description: Non-significant reduction in test group. Mean difference of 0.2 g/dL
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after initial exam

primary_outcome.description: Significant reduction in the test group. Mean reduction of 27.4 mg/dL.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after initial exam

primary_outcome.description: Significant reduction in test group. Mean difference of 8.2 mg/dL.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after initial exam

primary_outcome.description: Non-significant reduction in test group. Mean difference of 8.9 mg/dL.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 90 days after initial exam
